languages.text: "Но провидец жив". {n}Ирлиэт не сдвигается с места и испытующе смотрит на вас.{/n} "Разве ты не обещал{mf||а} помочь мне найти ответы, элантах? Быть может, этот провидец сможет, наконец, поведать, что именно случилось с Крударахом".

traits.locale_text: "Но провидец жив". {n}Ирлиэт не сдвигается с места и испытывающе смотрит на вас.{/n} "Разве ты не обещал{mf||а} помочь мне найти ответы, элантах? Быть может, этот провидец сможет, наконец, поведать, что именно случилось с Крударахом".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "But the Farseer is alive." {n}Yrliet does not move from her spot, giving you a scrutinising look.{/n} "Did you not promise to help me find answers, elantach? Perhaps this Farseer can at last tell us what exactly happened to Crudarach."
languages.original_text: "Но провидец жив". {n}Ирлиэт не сдвигается с места и испытующе смотрит на вас.{/n} "Разве ты не обещал{mf||а} помочь мне найти ответы, элантах? Быть может, этот провидец сможет, наконец, поведать, что именно случилось с Крударахом".

traits.locale_text: "But the Farseer is alive." {n}Yrliet gives you a scrutinising look without stirring from the spot.{/n} "Did you not promise to help me find answers, elantach? Perhaps this Farseer can at last tell us what exactly happened to Crudarach."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But the Farseer is alive." {n}Yrliet does not move from her spot, giving you a scrutinising look.{/n} "Did you not promise to help me find answers, elantach? Perhaps this Farseer can at last tell us what exactly happened to Crudarach."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But the Farseer is alive." {n}Yrliet does not move from her spot, giving you a scrutinising look.{/n} "Did you not promise to help me find answers, elantach? Perhaps this Farseer can at last tell us what exactly happened to Crudarach."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Pero el vidente aún vive». {n}Yrliet te escudriña con la mirada sin moverse de donde está.{/n} «¿No prometiste que me ayudarías a buscar respuestas, elantach? Quizá este vidente pueda decirnos qué le ocurrió a Crudarach».
languages.original_text: "But the Farseer is alive." {n}Yrliet does not move from her spot, giving you a scrutinising look.{/n} "Did you not promise to help me find answers, elantach? Perhaps this Farseer can at last tell us what exactly happened to Crudarach."

traits.locale_text: «Pero el vidente aún vive». {n}Yrliet te escudriña con la mirada sin moverse de donde está.{/n} «¿No prometiste que me ayudarías a buscar respuestas, elantach? Quizá este vidente pueda decirnos qué le ocurrió a Crudarach».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「だがこの先見司は生きている」{n}ユリエットはその場から動かず、あなたを詮索するような目で見た。{/n}「エランタ、答えを見つける手助けを約束してくれただろう？クルダラに何が起こったのか、最後にこの先見司が教えてくれるかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "But the Farseer is alive." {n}Yrliet does not move from her spot, giving you a scrutinising look.{/n} "Did you not promise to help me find answers, elantach? Perhaps this Farseer can at last tell us what exactly happened to Crudarach."

traits.locale_text: 「だがこの先見司は生きている」{n}ユリエットはその場から動かず、あなたを詮索するような目で見た。{/n}「エランタ、答えを見つける手助けを約束してくれただろう？クルダラに何が起こったのか、最後にこの先見司が教えてくれるかもしれない」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “可这个先知还活着。”{n}伊莉耶特一动不动，仔细打量着你。{/n}“你不是答应过我，说要帮我找到答案吗，外界人？或许这个先知可以告诉我们克鲁达拉赫到底发生了什么事情。”
languages.original_text: "But the Farseer is alive." {n}Yrliet does not move from her spot, giving you a scrutinising look.{/n} "Did you not promise to help me find answers, elantach? Perhaps this Farseer can at last tell us what exactly happened to Crudarach."

traits.locale_text: “可这个先知还活着。”{n}伊莉耶特一动不动，仔细打量着你。{/n}“你不是答应过我，说要帮我找到答案吗，外界人？或许这个先知可以告诉我们克鲁达拉赫到底发生了什么事情。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Mais le Grand Prophète est vivant. » {n}Yrliet ne bouge pas d'un pouce et vous scrute avec intensité.{/n} « Ne m'avez-vous pas promis de m'aider à trouver des réponses, elantach ? Ce Grand Prophète pourra enfin nous dire ce qui est arrivé à Crudarach. »
languages.original_text: "But the Farseer is alive." {n}Yrliet does not move from her spot, giving you a scrutinising look.{/n} "Did you not promise to help me find answers, elantach? Perhaps this Farseer can at last tell us what exactly happened to Crudarach."

traits.locale_text: « Mais le Grand Prophète est vivant. » {n}Yrliet ne bouge pas d'un pouce et vous scrute avec intensité.{/n} « Ne m'avez-vous pas promis de m'aider à trouver des réponses, elantach ? Ce Grand Prophète pourra enfin nous dire ce qui est arrivé à Crudarach. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Aber der Runenprophet lebt noch." {n}Yrliet rührt sich nicht von der Stelle und wirft dir einen prüfenden Blick zu.{/n} "Ihr habt doch versprochen, mir dabei zu helfen, Antworten zu finden, Elantach? Vielleicht weiß dieser Runenprophet, was mit Crudarach genau geschehen ist."
languages.original_text: "But the Farseer is alive." {n}Yrliet does not move from her spot, giving you a scrutinising look.{/n} "Did you not promise to help me find answers, elantach? Perhaps this Farseer can at last tell us what exactly happened to Crudarach."

traits.locale_text: "Aber der Runenprophet lebt noch." {n}Yrliet rührt sich nicht von der Stelle und wirft dir einen prüfenden Blick zu.{/n} "Ihr habt doch versprochen, mir dabei zu helfen, Antworten zu finden, Elantach? Vielleicht weiß dieser Runenprophet, was mit Crudarach genau geschehen ist."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "İyi de Ötesezen yaşıyor." {n}Yrliet, yerinden kıpırdamadan sana irdeleyici bir bakış fırlatıyor.{/n} "Sorularıma cevap bulmama yardım edeceğine söz vermemiş miydin elantach? Belki bu Ötesezen, nihayet bize Crudarach'a tam olarak ne olduğunu söyleyebilir."
languages.original_text: "But the Farseer is alive." {n}Yrliet does not move from her spot, giving you a scrutinising look.{/n} "Did you not promise to help me find answers, elantach? Perhaps this Farseer can at last tell us what exactly happened to Crudarach."

traits.locale_text: "İyi de Ötesezen yaşıyor." {n}Yrliet, yerinden kıpırdamadan sana irdeleyen bir bakış fırlatıyor.{/n} "Sorularıma cevap bulmada bana yardım edeceğine söz vermemiş miydin elantach? Belki bu Ötesezen, en sonunda bize Crudarach'a tam olarak ne olduğunu söyleyebilir."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
